import React, {useEffect, useContext} from 'react' import { QuotesContext } from '../context/QuotesContext' export default function Home() { const {today, getToday} = useContext(QuotesContext) useEffect(() => { getToday() console.log("useEffect") }, []) console.log('today.a', today) return ( <>

Influential Leaders. Timeless Wisdom.


{today.a} {today.h}

{today.q}

) }
